Malden.Stone Zoo: Stone Zoo is a medium-small sized zoo of about 26 acres (11 ha) in Stoneham, Massachusetts, United States, by the Spot Pond reservoir. Founded in 1905, the Zoo includes low-lying areas densely developed with smaller exhibits for animals and forested, rocky hillsides devoted to larger habitats for SSP programs. It is operated by Zoo New England, which also operates the Franklin Park Zoo in Boston.
